alfredsnippet.snippet:
Dicke, Robert H., Science, 129, p.621

"In addition to dissatisfaction with the scanty observational evidence supporting Einstein's theory of gravitation, there are certain conceptual difficulties which are a source of doubt concerning the complete correctness of the theory in its present form."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Dissatisfaction and Conceptual Difficulties of Einstein's Theory of Gravitation
